body:
Title. I've been here 4 years and never done one of these, so I might as well.

Feel free to ask me any question you want.
body_tagged:
Title. I've been here 4 years and never done one of these, so I might as well.

Feel free to ask me any question you want.
title: 4 years/return AMA-- Milki/MilkCream

replies.body:
Onions taste amazing.

Orion is an interesting constellation.

The only operation I know is #OperationFillInTheMiddle (bring back Rendezvous please)

Opinions: I don't see you much, so I don't know you that well, but you seem to be a great guy from Discord convos. Also, hot.

edit: oops meant this to be a reply

Don't know you that well, sorry :( You're probably a cool guy though.

Color? Not sure, but I like black, white, and crimson.

Gamemode: DTM.
